item.title: Rates for Hire
item.description: Geotek Internal University Use: $ 50/hr, min charge of 4 hours External Research Use: $80/hr (non commercial entities i.e CRI’s, other universities etc) Commercial Use: $150/hr Training Fee of $200 + Geotek time iTrax Principal User Use: $100/hr (see list below incl students and collaborators) Outside Principal Group: $130/hr (non commercial entities i.e CRI’s, other universities etc) Commercial Use: $250/hr Training Fee of $200 + iTrax time Technician Costs $65/hour for the first 2 categories on both lists
